@danazumiEffectIntegratedNeuromuscular2021

reproduction of sciatic symptoms using a flexion, adduction, and internal rotation (FAIR) test performed with the patient in a lateral recumbent position with the affected side up @danazumiEffectIntegratedNeuromuscular2021


The FAIR test is designed to detect sciatic nerve compression by the piriformis

# Technique

- Supine or Contralateral sidelying
- Hold the ipsilateral knee
- Passively move the ipsilateral hip into *flexion + adduction + IR*

Pain provocation at the intersection between the piriformis and sciatic nerve is a positive test @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020.


# Psychometrics

## Sensitivity

Sens: 0.88 @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020

## Specificity

Spec: 0.83 @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020

## Likelihood Ratio

- +LR of 5.2 @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
- -LR of 0.14 @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
